Class FlatpackDataFormat

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OtherAttributesAware

    @Metadata(label="dataformat,transformation,csv",
          title="Flatpack")
public class FlatpackDataFormat
extends DataFormatDefinition
    Flatpack data format
